Description: A hand-modelled terracotta horse with a loop for suspension. Tail lost and left hind leg damaged. Brown Nile silt with some mica; traces of an overall white dressing.
Curator's comments: Terracotta IV Purchased: Greville J. Chester. Uncertain date.
Bibliographic references: Terracotta / Catalogue of Terracottas in the British Museum (3755)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Greville John Chester
